price: Mola Mlezi wa mbingu na ardhi na vilio baina yao, ikiwa nyinyi mna yakini.
arabic: رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ
footnotes: Yeye ndiye Muumba mbingu na ardhi na vilio baina yao, ikiwa nyinyi mna yakini na haki, na mnaifuata, na mnaamini kuwa hakika ndio Yeye Mwenye kuteremsha Qur'ani kuwa ni rehema na uwongofu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: rabbi al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā in kuntum mūqinīna
